items.title: Floating Oil Storage Surge Puts Market Balance on Edge

items.title: The AI Boom Is Driving a Massive Geothermal Energy Revival
items.summary: Geothermal energy is becoming Big Tech’s newest darling. Silicon Valley is upending its deep pockets into enhanced geothermal startups in a bid to stay one step ahead of the massive energy demand growth trend being spurred by the AI boom. Geothermal

items.title: Iran Is on the Brink of “Water Bankruptcy”

items.title: The UK Is Transforming Coal Mines Into Geothermal Hubs
